name: Minimal Lyria Player
description: A minimal example to demonstrate real-time music generation with Lyria using a single text prompt.
prompt: Create a simple web application that allows a user to input a text prompt and generate real-time music using the Lyria model. The UI should consist of a text input for the prompt and a play/pause button. The application should handle connecting to the Lyria service, sending the prompt, receiving audio data, and playing it back. Basic error handling and status messages should be included.
